Advance Hackathon

08 Apr 2012

Yeah...the next hackathon for hcking.de is approaching. From 27th to 29th of April you will find me and around 60 other hackers at the

There will be tons of different topics to hack on. A list of all proposals can be found on Github. Sadly it is fully booked, but I don't think that anybody would throw you out if you come by ;) .
